edu.illinois.library.cantaloupe.cache

Interface DerivativeCache

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cache

    public interface DerivativeCache
extends Cache

    Interface to be implemented by cache that cache derivative images and metadata.

    Implementations must be thread-safe.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ImageInfo getImageInfo(Identifier identifier)
      Reads cached image information.
      java.io.InputStream getImageInputStream(OperationList opList)
      Returns an input stream corresponding to the given OperationList, or null if a non-expired image corresponding to the given operation list does not exist in the cache..
      java.io.OutputStream getImageOutputStream(OperationList opList) 
      void purge(OperationList opList)
      Deletes the cached image corresponding to the given operation list.

      • Methods inherited from interface edu.illinois.library.cantaloupe.cache.Cache

        cleanUp, purge, purgeExpired, purgeImage

    • Method Detail

      • getImageInfo

        ImageInfo getImageInfo(Identifier identifier)
                throws CacheException

        Reads cached image information.

        If image information corresponding to the given identifier exists in the cache but is expired, implementations should delete it.

        Parameters:
        identifier - Image identifier for which to retrieve information.
        Returns:
        ImageInfo corresponding to the given identifier, or null if no non-expired info exists in the cache.
        Throws:
        CacheException

      • getImageInputStream

        java.io.InputStream getImageInputStream(OperationList opList)
                                 throws CacheException

        Returns an input stream corresponding to the given OperationList, or null if a non-expired image corresponding to the given operation list does not exist in the cache..

        If an image corresponding to the given list exists in the cache but is expired, implementations should delete it before returning null.

        Parameters:
        opList - Operation list for which to retrieve an input stream for reading from the cache.
        Returns:
        Input stream corresponding to the given operation list, or null if a non-expired image corresponding to the given operation list does not exist in the cache.
        Throws:
        CacheException

      • getImageOutputStream

        java.io.OutputStream getImageOutputStream(OperationList opList)
                                   throws CacheException
        Parameters:
        opList - Operation list for which to retrieve an output stream for writing to the cache.
        Returns:
        Output stream to which an image corresponding to the given operation list can be written.
        Throws:
        CacheException

      • purge

        void purge(OperationList opList)
    throws CacheException
        Deletes the cached image corresponding to the given operation list.
        Parameters:
        opList -
        Throws:
        CacheException - Upon fatal error. Implementations should do the best they can to complete the operation and swallow and log non-fatal errors.

      • putImageInfo

        void putImageInfo(Identifier identifier,
                  ImageInfo imageInfo)
           throws CacheException

        Adds image information to the cache.

        If the information corresponding to the given identifier already exists, it should be overwritten.

        If writing is interrupted, implementations should perform cleanup, if necessary.

        Parameters:
        identifier - Identifier of the image corresponding to the given size.
        imageInfo - ImageInfo containing image information.
        Throws:
        CacheException
